img_text: MEDITERRANEAN SEA IRAQ SYRIA Phase 3 Phase 2 Phase 1 DEAD SAUDI ARABIA ISRAEL This is a wall. Between Jordan and Syria. Why? To keep ISIS out. Want to guess who paid for it? The US. Yup, the US built a wall in Jordan. 274 miles worth. This was approved by the Dems in the house and senate. But, a Wall for the US is immoral. Apparently it's not immoral in Jordan. Well well isn't that interesting?
